description: This file contains styles for the Tic Tac Toe frontend application, including variables for colors and layouts for various components such as the game container, title, buttons, and game board.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main application container with styles for layout and background.

classes.name: game-container
classes.description: Styles for the container holding the game elements, ensuring proper width and padding.

classes.name: game-title
classes.description: Styles for the title of the game, setting color, size, and margin.

classes.name: mode-button
classes.description: Styles for the game mode buttons, including designs for active state and hover effects.

classes.name: status
classes.description: Styles for displaying the game status with emphasis on color and font weight.

classes.name: game-board
classes.description: Grid layout styles for arranging the squares of the game board.

classes.name: square
classes.description: Styles for individual squares in the game board, handling appearance and interactions.

classes.name: reset-button
classes.description: Styles for the reset button, including hover effects.
